name: Categories
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: common categories
des: Common Categories is an odd-man-out game designed for children 13 years and younger. Every question contains 4 words, and the child must pick out which word does not belong. An example question may be "cat dog apple hippo". In this question, "apple" does not belong because it is a food and the other words are animals. The goal of this game is to teach young children how to think quickly and associate similar words.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
